memberdef.name: RenderTechnique

parameterdescription.para: The render target for this technique.

briefdescription.para: Lists the intermediate view used by the whole technique.
Updates the render pass, CPU wise.
Updates the render pass, GPU wise.
Writes the technique into a text file.

simplesect.para: The number of steps needed for initialisation, to show progression.
